original: śaṃkare evaṃ devanityatānityayuktatā adhyayanaṃ dhyānaṃ smaraṇaṃ nityasāyujyamiti
analyzed: śaṃkare evam deva nityatā nitya yuktatā adhyayanam dhyānam smaraṇam nitya sāyujyam iti
vistaraḥ vibhāgaḥ kriyā lakṣaṇam kriyā uparama lakṣaṇam dūra darśana śravaṇa manana vijñānāni

original: gaṇapatiḥ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sampravartate siddhaḥ gacched duḥkhānāmantam ityevamādyo vibhāgaḥ // PSBh_5.46:42
analyzed: gaṇapatiḥ bhūyiṣṭham sampravartate siddhaḥ gacchet duḥkhānām antam iti evamādyaḥ vibhāgaḥ
jñāna śaktiḥ kriyā śaktiḥ ca
tatra jñāna śaktiḥ śravaṇa ādyā
iti evamādyaḥ vibhāgaḥ

original: * viśeṣaḥ anyeṣāṃ kaivalyam iha tu viśeṣo vikaraṇamiti // PSBh_5.46:47
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ anyeṣām kaivalyam iha tu viśeṣaḥ vikaraṇam iti

original: * pratikaraṇa iti kaivalyadharmātiśaktir niṣkalam aiśvaryamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ // PSBh_5.46:48
analyzed: pratikaraṇe iti kaivalya dharma atiśaktiḥ niṣkalam aiśvaryam iti eṣa viśeṣaḥ

original: * upasaṃhāraḥ ity ebhir guṇairyukta iti // PSBh_5.46:49
analyzed: upasaṃhāraḥ iti ebhiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ iti

original: * ato yāvanti vākyaviśeṣāṇi saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭāni nirvacanāni tāni ca sarvanirvacanānīti kṛtvā yuktamuktam // PSBh_5.46:50
analyzed: atas yāvanti vākya viśeṣāṇi saṃnikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭāni nirvacanāni tāni ca sarva nirvacanāni iti kṛtvā yuktam uktam

original: * evamatra śrībhagavatkauṇḍinyaviracite śrīmadyogapāśupataśāstrasūtravyākhyāne pañcārthabhāṣye pañcamo'dhyāyaḥ saha brahmaṇā granthato 'rthataśca  #
analyzed: evam atra śrī bhagavat kauṇḍinya viracite śrīmat yoga pāśupata śāstra sūtra vyākhyāne pañcārtha bhāṣye pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ saha brahmaṇā granthataḥ rthataḥ ca
parisamāptaḥ iti
